sentences.en: a teddy bear with movable arms and legs
All his movable property was forfeited to the king's use.
sentences.cn: 他的全部动产被没收归国库所有.

sentences.en: Attached to the stabilizers are two movable surface called " elevator ".
sentences.cn: 与水平安定面相连的是两个称为 “ 升降舵 ” 的可动操纵面.

sentences.en: Bi Sheng first introduced movable type printing in the 1040's.
sentences.cn: 活字印刷术是11世纪40年代由毕升发明的.

sentences.en: Christmas is fixed, but Easter is a movable feast.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的日期是固定的, 但复活节的日期却因年而异.

sentences.en: In legal terms, there are movable and immovable property between the two.
sentences.cn: 法律上讲, 有动产和不动产之间的分别.

sentences.en: Movable splitters should always advertise their pliancy with cursor hinting.
sentences.cn: 可移动的分割线应该借助光标暗示显示其受范性.

sentences.en: Non - copyable and non - movable objects can't be stored in non - intrusive containers.
sentences.cn: 不可复制和不可移动的对象不能保存在 非 介入式容器中.

sentences.en: Pls . fix pocket with movable stitches as sealing sample.
sentences.cn: 请跟原办在口袋上车上(可拆去的)假缝线.

sentences.en: Sealed cover , perpendicular fifter Vance , compact structure, few movable parts , convenient to maintenance.
sentences.cn: 机壳密闭 、 垂直滤叶, 结构紧凑, 易维修保养.

sentences.en: The ailerons are movable sections along the rear edges of the wings.
sentences.cn: 副翼是机翼后缘的可动部分.

sentences.en: The crew threw everything movable overboard to lighten the plane.
sentences.cn: 为了减轻飞机重量,机上的人员把一切可以移动的东西都扔出机舱.
这个木栅栏是可移动的。

sentences.en: The workers decided to hoist the machine with a movable pulley.
sentences.cn: 工人们决定使用动滑轮把这台机器吊上来.

sentences.en: They gave the value of one - fourth of all the movable property that they owned.
sentences.cn: 他们捐出了他们全部动产的 四分之一 的钱.

sentences.en: This limitation was overcome with the invention of movable type.
sentences.cn: 随着活字的发明,这一障碍得取了克服.

words.tran_cn: 原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）
动产的；可移动的；不固定的

trans.tran_cn: 活动的，可移动的，动产的
trans.tran_en: able to be moved and not fixed in one place or position

trans.tran_cn: 动产，可移动的东西，动产[通常用复数] [亦作moveable
trans.tran_en: a personal possession such as a piece of furniture
